name: Thunder (ArkuDada, Bonkmini)
description:
This is a story about the great god of Olympus , Zeus.
The story about his quests on winning a maiden's heart.

Take on the role of the great god of thunder Zeus and conquer the maidens such as Danae , Europa , Io and Semele while hiding your action from your wife Hera.

Creator

Programming - ArkuDada & Bonkmini

Art - APC(Portrait  & Throne room) & glory_dino13(Aeteos) & ArkuDada(Pixel) 
Background created using Nvidia Canvas

Story -  glory_dino13

Narration - Bonkmini

Credits

sound effect - https://www.soundjay.com/
